resources:
MCGeoQuiz Welcome! Press Next to begin True False Correct! Incorrect! Previous Next
Batman is the best superhero. --true Dang right! No super power but he\'s one fine modern gentleman. Um... no. Try again.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire. -- true I know! Crazy right!? Nope! Actually it is.
Clint Eastwood is older than sliced bread. -- false Right! Clint was born in 1930. Sliced bread was introduced in 1928. Wrong! But Betty White is!
It took NASA over two decades to land on the moon. -- false Right. NASA was founded in 1958 and landed on the moon in 1969. Nope! In the span of only 63 years, we went from taking flight to landing on the moon.
Scotlandâ€™s national animal is the platypus. -- true Right! Do you know what it is? Nope! It\'s the unicorn! Whaaat??
Cheat! Cheating is naughty! Are you sure you want to cheat? Be naughty! No, I\'m an angel. You sly dog you! It\'s\: I\'m sorry I cheated. True False
